items.title: Regularly $90 Burton Goods leather Apple Watch band with brushed metal connectors now 35% off
items.summary:
Last fall Burton Goods debuted one of the more unique bands in its Apple Watch collection with the Titanium Leather Band. Combing its usual traditional American leather craft work with reinforced brushed stainless steel  connectors, it elevates its usual timeless leather look with a robust and weighty experience that, in my testing, feels great on the wrist. Best of all, using code BG20 at checkout will drop nearly 35% off the list price.

items.summary: Apple is debuting the iPhone 17 at its annual hardware event on September 9.

items.title: French parliament votes to oust prime minister, deepening political crisis
items.summary: PARIS (Reuters) - France's parliament voted on Monday to bring down the government over its plans to tame the ballooning national debt, deepening a political crisis and handing President Emmanuel Macron the task of finding a fifth prime minister in less than two years. Read full story

items.title: First deal strikes Samsung’s 40-inch Odyssey G7 180Hz WUHD curved gaming monitor at $180 off
items.summary:
Samsung unleashed a bunch of new gaming monitors last month, and one of them is already discounted. Amazon is currently offering the brand’s new 40-inch Odyssey G7 180Hz gaming monitor for $1,019.99 shipped, down from its original $1,200 launch price. That’s a $180 savings and the lowest price we’ve seen so far. It’s been holding steady at full price since debuting last month, making today’s deal the first notable drop. Samsung still has it for $1,200, so be sure to cash in and score it for your battlestation after getting more details below.

more…

items.title: This new smart standing desk works with Alexa, Google Assistant, Siri Shortcuts, more at $90 (Reg. $140)
items.summary:
HUANUO 32-inch Smart Standing Desk

Buy for $90 (Reg. $140)

Clip the on-page $20 off coupon.

What we love

Believe it or not, you’re looking at a smart standing desk. That’s right, it can be controlled with Alexa, Google Assistant, Siri Shortcuts, and even using an app on your smartphone. Outside of this obvious perk, I also like that this unit is compact, spanning just 32 by 19 inches. This makes it a great option for folks working with a one monitor setup, solely on a laptop, or perhaps an iPad.

A look at the looming DJI drones ban in the US, as some say the ban will be disruptive; no federal agency has undertaken a mandated security risk assessment  —  Farmers, builders and police officers use drones made by DJI, a Chinese company.  Trump and his allies want to stop all imports.

items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the Greenworks 82V Cordless Earth Auger with 4.0Ah battery and dual-port charger at $326.49 shipped, which beats out the pricing direct from the brand’s website by $174. While it carries an $800 MSRP direct from the brand, it starts off at $600 at Amazon, which we’ve seen keeping between $466 and $546 with most discounts, though there was a fall to $350 back in July. Today’s deal comes in as a larger-than-ever 46% markdown that cuts $274 off the tag for the best and lowest price we have tracked to date.

Buy for $17 (Reg. $42)

items.summary:
The official unveiling of the new Apple Watch Series 11 is all but imminent at this point, and will almost certainly take center stage during tomorrow’s Apple reveal event in roughly 24 hours from now. In the lead up to tomorrow’s showcase, just about all of the Series 10 deals have completely disappeared – I guess Amazon doesn’t want folks landing a discount on a Series 10 instead of the just buying the new model later this week – except for this 46mm Jet Black GPS + Cell variant at $119 off that is.

G4Free Crossbody Sling Bag

Buy for $10 (Reg. $17.50)

What we love

I switched over from carrying a wallet to a small sling bag earlier this year. I love that I can have all the things I might need in one place so I don’t have to worry about forgetting anything. I stow a pair of sunglasses, my keys, debit card, ID, some mints, and more inside of mine.

items.title: Shape and clear weeds with EGO’s 56V cordless 15-inch trimmer and 670 CFM blower combo at $320 low (Reg. up to $410)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering a second chance at the best price on the newer EGO Power+ bundle that gives you a 56V Cordless 15-inch String Trimmer and Cordless 670 CFM Leaf Blower with a 4.0Ah battery at $319.99 shipped. This combo kit first hit Amazon back at the top of March and has since been seen ranging from $370 to $410 when at full price. We’ve seen discounts take things down to this $320 low in April, while June saw the price stay at a raised rate, which only dropped to $330 for July’s Prime Day event and the following week. Now, the low price is coming back around, with the 22% markdown here cutting up to $90 off the going rate.

Four current and former Meta staffers allege that after an earlier whistleblower, Frances Haugen, leaked internal research to Congress, the company called on its […]

items.title: Jamaica's opposition doubles seats in final election tally
items.summary: KINGSTON (Reuters) -Jamaica's governing Jamaica Labour Party (JLP) will command a smaller majority in parliament, according to final results from the September 3 election published late on Sunday evening, after the opposition People's National Party (PNP) doubled its seats in parliament.  Read full story

items.title: US Supreme Court backs Trump on aggressive immigration raids
items.summary: (Reuters) - The U.S. Supreme Court again backed President Donald Trump's hardline approach toward immigration on Monday, letting federal agents proceed with raids in Southern California targeting people for deportation based on their race or language. Read full story

items.title: EcoFlow’s latest 48-hour flash sale drops DELTA Pro 440W solar bundle to new $1,899 low (Reg. up to $4,997), more from $709
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing September Home Backup Sale running through to next week, EcoFlow has launched a 48-hour flash sale that is taking up to 62% off four units, though sadly, these are not benefitting from any extra savings codes. Among the four offers, we spotted the DELTA Pro Portable Power Station bundled with two 220W solar panels for $1,899 shipped, which beats out Amazon’s pricing by $300. This package usually goes for $4,997 at full price without any discounts, though it’s more often kept down around a $3,999 starting price at Amazon, with discounts having dropped costs as low as $2,199 there, while we’ve seen it dip lower to $2,089 with bonus savings in past sales directly from the brand’s website. You’re looking at a lower-than-ever price for the next two days, cutting $2,100 off the going rate ($3,098 off the MSRP) for the lowest price we have tracked. Head below for more on this model and the other 48-hour flash offers, and if you want the above station on its own, check out the new promotional low price you can score here through the coming weeks.

more…

Even if you — like most modern devices — have switched to USB-C, there’s always that one older accessory that still needs a USB-A connection and leaves you scrambling. So avoid getting caught unprepared and keep this 3-pack ready on hand. These are also braided for extra durability, so they’ll likely last you for a long time.

items.title: iPhone 17 debuts tomorrow, but the 1TB iPhone 15 Pro Max is over $730 off (Renewed Premium)
items.summary:
Update: Prices have now dropped a touch lower once again on the black 1TB iPhone 15 Pro Max with models starting at $867.69 shipped. Details below in the original post.

Apple will officially unleash iPhone 17 in exactly one week from today at its upcoming “Awe dropping” event. But for those not interested in paying the premium Apple’s latest and greatest will surely come along with – early leaks and reports suggest will be seeing a slight price increase this year too, Amazon Premium Renewed listings on the spec’d out iPhone 15 Pro Max have dropped even lower. You can land one at nearly $730 off the original list price right now.

items.title: Spotify’s new ‘smart filters’ let you screen library content by activity, genre or mood
items.summary: Spotify is launching a new feature that allows users to filter their library by specific activities, moods, or genres. These filters can also be used to find playlists, or, to some extent, audiobooks and podcasts, and can even kick off a new session on Spotify's AI DJ.

items.title: Haul precious cargo up to 90+ miles with Rad Power’s RadWagon 4 extra battery e-bike bundle at $1,599 ($2,248 value)
items.summary:
As part of Rad Power’s ongoing Fall Savings Sale, which we saw pop up last week to offer multiple extra battery e-bike bundles, including on the new RadRunner series, we wanted to shine a spotlight on the brand’s popular RadWagon 4 Cargo e-bike that is also getting an extra battery at $1,599 shipped. The e-bike alone would cost you $1,799 at full price, which we’ve seen dropping down to $1,599 and $1,499 in 2025. While this is the second-best price of the year, you are also getting the 10Ah Safe Shield Battery ($449 value) for free, making it one of the best savings opportunities we’ve tracked this year – just be sure to add both the e-bike and the battery to your cart for the discount to be applied automatically.

items.summary: PARIS (Reuters) -A Paris court ruled on Monday that French far-right leader Marine Le Pen's appeal trial against an embezzlement conviction that barred her from running in the 2027 election will start on January 13, keeping her presidential hopes alive. Read full story

items.title: Samsung selling its brand new mid-range Galaxy Tab S10 Lite from $350 with a FREE $80 Smart Cover
items.summary:
Samsung unleashed its brand new flagship S11 and S11 Ultra tablets last week – you can still score up to $150 off and as much as $800 with trade-ins. However, flying somewhat under the radar, it also launched a new, much more affordable mid-range Galaxy Tab S10 Lite. This more casual tablet undercuts the Tab S10 FE series by $300 and lands at $450 under the most affordable new S11 – plus you can score a FREE $80 Smart Cover with purchase right now.

items.title: Prime members can steal Anker’s regularly $25 MagSafe microSD card reader with USB-C for just $8 today (64% off)
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, Anker’s official storefront is offering Prime members its MagGo SD card USB-C Adapter for $8.99 shipped. That’s $16 less than what folks without a Prime membership will have to spend for this unit today, which works out to about a 64% discount. This particular accessory dropped to the $10 mark during the Prime Day sale a couple of months ago, and today’s deal brings it $1 below that to mark a new best price to beat. You can get this in black, white, and teal finishes, and they’re all down to $9 today. Head below for more details.

items.title: Anker’s new SOLIX C1000 Gen 2 LiFePO4 power station arrives with launch discounts starting from $429 (Reg. $799)
items.summary:
Anker SOLIX is starting the week off with the official launch of its newest SOLIX C1000 Gen 2 Portable Power Station at $449 shipped for those who didn’t jump on the pre-sale savings discount that takes things down to $429 shipped – which you should have received via email. Outside of these launch prices, this new unit will fetch $799 at full price, with it not yet available on Amazon. It was first unveiled and opened to its preorder promotion three weeks ago, which entailed simply signing up directly on the brand’s website to receive the emailed promo code. For those who missed the chance, you’re still looking at a solid 44% markdown that cuts $350 off the tag straight out of the gate. There’s also an option to bundle the station with a water-resistant protective bag at $529 shipped, down from $899, as well as some solar panels and discounted accessories available on the same listing page.

items.title: Don’t miss DJI’s Mic Mini transmitter and receiver combo while they’re starting at just $39 today (All-time low)
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find DJI’s tiny Mic Mini Wireless Lavalier Microphone Transmitter for $39 shipped. You can get this in black and white finishes, and they’re both down to the $39 mark, which is $20 less than their usual going rate and the lowest we have tracked for them to date. Folks pairing it with DJI’s Osmo Action 4/5 Pro or Osmo Pocket 3 can get by with just the transmitter, but others will need the transmitter + receiver bundle, which is also discounted to $59 shipped, down from its usual going rate of $89. Amazon is additionally offering the 2 TX + 1 RX + charging case combo for $109 shipped, which also happens to be the lowest price we’ve seen for it, down from $169. There has never been a better time to snag DJI’s Mic Mini microphone, so be sure to snag the deals after getting more details below.
